Title: Eliminates the MTA's exemption from environmental quality review standards established by article 8 of the environmental conservation law
Summary: Eliminates the MTA's exemption from environmental quality review standards established by article 8 of the environmental conservation law.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to eliminating the metropolitan commuter transportation authority's environmental quality review exemption
